name: YUME 2: Sleepless Night
description:
Life of people during the war on edge, and at this time it is more difficult to trust people. They will consider how to survive in the chaotic world, and so does Menghan. Players can experience the difficulties of life during the war from various angles.



Time passes, the girl in the previous game had met the illusion of the past. And in "YUME 2: Sleepless Night", the player will experience the life of the girl in red at that time.



The girl in the era of war struggles to survive in a complex relationship, wandering between forces, perhaps some people will feel that this is playing with the feelings of others, in fact, they are all victims, and love at this time has become something luxury.

In this game, players will experience the girl's story in the Manxiang Dance Hall from the perspective of the girl in red, and piece together the dusty past through various pieces of memories.



YUME 2: Sleepless Night, a sequel plot game from YUME.
